data.title: Linearity: Professional Vector Design & Animation Tools for Apple Devices | Linearity
data.description: Create stunning designs and animations with Linearity's Curve and Move. Powerful, intuitive software for Mac, iPad, and iPhone. Start for free today!
data.content:

===============

![Image 1: Apple Badge](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/191x40/fa4504cd08/badge-4-7-appstore.svg)

Design & Animation
==================

Loved by designers at

![Image 2: Home Hero Logo 1](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/90x33/1ba50420a0/leapsome_id7lqp9j-8_6.svg)

![Image 3: Home Hero Logo 2](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/25x33/f1ae216eb0/logo-apple.svg)

![Image 4: Home Hero Logo 3](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/65x33/fbdcb8a330/google-logo-wine-1.svg)

![Image 5: Home Hero Logo 4](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/50x33/8f78253a05/universal_pictures_logo-1.svg)

![Image 6: Home Hero Logo 5](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/65x33/4f1eca4311/logo-disney.svg)

![Image 7: Home Hero Logo 6](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/62x33/c37daa02f3/sumup_logo-1.svg)

![Image 8: Home Hero Logo 7](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/67x33/0cf0a0b870/svg.svg)

![Image 9: Home Hero Logo 8](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/74x33/546bc71bc0/meta_platforms_inc-_logo-1.svg)

![Image 10: Product Logo](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/183x29/fd5ca7ac8f/product-logo-curve.svg)

#### Design Anything

[Download](https://app.adjust.com/1cr89iqi?engagement_type=fallback_click&redirect_ios=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.apple.com%2Fus%2Fapp%2Flinearity-curve-graphic-design%2Fid1219074514%3Fppid%3D74701584-e8e4-4bda-9691-3cba1c8bde60)[###### Learn more](https://www.linearity.io/curve/)

![Image 11: Linearity Logo](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/1320x1310/a110e883c0/mockup-curve-home-hero.png/m/0x0/filters:format(png):quality(75))

![Image 12: Product Logo](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/177x30/706fc8c6eb/product-logo-move.svg)

#### Animate Instantly

[Download](https://app.adjust.com/1c1wk1gj?engagement_type=fallback_click&redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.apple.com%2Fus%2Fapp%2Flinearity-move-animation-maker%2Fid6443677011%3Fppid%3D1763e757-8803-4fca-a7b7-4b4f68392333)[###### Learn more](https://www.linearity.io/move/)

![Image 13: Linearity Logo](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/1320x1311/327d26e1a3/mockup-move-home-hero.png/m/0x0/filters:format(png):quality(75))

Why Designers & Animators Choose Linearity
------------------------------------------

Made for illustrators, designers and creative professionals.

![Image 14: Intuitive drawing tools](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/672x671/44dac92d5f/intuitive-drawing-tools-mobile-1.png/m/336x336/filters:format(png):quality(75))

#### Lightning-Fast, Effortless Design

Enjoy a modern, sleek & intuitive interface

![Image 15: Design & Animation for macOS and Ipad](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/670x671/77427f39e5/mac-and-ipad-mobile.png/m/336x336/filters:format(png):quality(75))

#### Design Anywhere, Anytime

Syncs across all your Apple devices, so you can create wherever inspiration strikes.

![Image 16: Powerful tools](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/670x670/e130b4c47d/powerfull-tools-mobile.png/m/336x336/filters:format(png):quality(75))

#### Powerful AI

Vectorize anything with Auto Trace and remove & generate backgrounds in a click.

![Image 17: Outstanding experience](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/670x671/eb229ff158/outstanding-experience-mobile.png/m/336x336/filters:format(png):quality(75))

#### Professional Results

Complete creative control ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎with the precision & ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ flexibility‎ ‎to edit, ‎refine, ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ and perfect‎ ‎every detail‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ of your work.

Everything you need to get started
----------------------------------

[![Image 18: templates](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/622x785/8c1cc5a96e/templates-card.jpg/m/337x425/filters:format(jpeg):quality(75)) #### Templates Jumpstart your designs with fully customizable templates for marketing, branding, and digital content. Learn more](https://www.linearity.io/templates/)

[![Image 19: user guides](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/622x785/e99b4af21c/user-guides-card.jpg/m/337x425/filters:format(jpeg):quality(75)) #### User Guides Master Linearity’s powerful tools with step-by-step guides. Learn more](https://www.linearity.io/academy/)

[![Image 20: tutorials](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/622x785/55ae4ae278/tutorials-card.jpg/m/337x425/filters:format(jpeg):quality(75)) #### Tutorials Learn design techniques and motion graphics with our expert-led tutorials Learn more](https://www.linearity.io/academy/online-courses/)

[![Image 21: Design Tips & Stories](https://a.storyblok.com/f/197805/622x785/9fbd6ee1a0/design-tips-and-stories-card-1.jpg/m/337x425/filters:format(jpeg):quality(75)) #### Design Tips & Stories Get inspired by expert insights, creative tips, and real-world designer stories. Learn more](https://www.linearity.io/academy/)

Get started with Linearity today.
---------------------------------
